description: Cullen primes: primes of the form n*2^n+1.
comments: The next term is too large to display here, having 1423 digits. See A005849.
links: Ray Ballinger, Cullen Primes: Definition and Status
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Cullen Number
mathematica: lst={};Do[If[PrimeQ[p=n*2^n+1], Print[p];AppendTo[lst, p]], {n, 10^9}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Aug 21 2008 *)Select[Table[n*2^n+1,{n,5000}],PrimeQ] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 14 2014 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 30 1999
